summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3343, for the improvement of King Street, from 12th Avenue South to Rainier Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 41264 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
